text:
I have a problem with a embedded SVG font and dynamic update of text elements. The text elements/
glyphs don't seem to refresh/update properly. Update is done with ECMAScript.

The same application works fine with a system font, but fails with the embedded SVG font.

As an illustration please have a look at http://www.carto.net/williams/yosemite/unstable/index.svg 
which works fine with the system font vs. http://www.carto.net/williams/yosemite/index.svg which 
fails with the embedded SVG font. Note, e.g. the mouse move coordinate display or the dynamically 
placed text-labels in the map, which fail to refresh.

I would provide further details if necessary.
creator: neumann@karto.baug.ethz.ch
deweese@apache.org
text: This is now fixed in CVS.
